WorkItem.Description:
On page http://www.asp.net/mvc/tutorials/mvc-music-store-part-8 , in the section entitled Ajax updates with jQuery , there are no instructions as to where to Create the View named 'Index'.

I had to examine the completed project to figure out that the instructions should have read

"Add a new Folder under Views, entitled ShoppingCart".

then "right click on the new ShoppingCart folder, and select 'Add' to add a new View..."

 

TNX

 

Marvin

Comments.Message: Agreed it's a bit vague, but if you assume that you create the file the same way as the others i.e. by right-clicking inside the Index method and selecting Add View, then the folder structure is created automatically for you. Should definitely have been made clearer/added as a reminder that we could do that though.
